Manga Library - Powered by Kosmo & Keys

Stay organized with your favorite mangas! Manga Library is your personal digital manga shelf, allowing you to track, store, and filter the titles and chapters you're following. Never lose track of what you're reading again!

Key Features:
- Save Manga Titles & Links: Effortlessly store all the manga you follow, with direct links to the chapters.
- Track Chapter Progress: Add, manage, and update chapters as you read, so you always know where you left off.
- Smart Filters: Easily sort and search through your manga library based on title, latest chapter, or progress.
- Simple & Intuitive Interface: Built for manga lovers, by manga lovers â€“ quick, easy, and user-friendly.

Manga Library is designed to help you organize your ever-growing list of manga and keep track of where you are in each series. Whether you're an avid manga fan with a huge collection or just getting started, our extension is the perfect tool to keep your reading life organized.
